document_data.name: ''Hammersong''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Hammersong''''' was a [[warhammer]] that was wielded by the [[avatar]] of [[Gaerdal Ironhand]].<ref name=frcs-3e-p240">
document_data.Powers: This powerful warhammer had a ''+4'' enchantment. Whenever ''Hammersong'' hit a solid surface, it emitted a ''[[deafening clang]]''. Everyone who heard this ear-shattering ringing would be rendered [[deaf]] for a time, but Gaerdal himself was immune.
